alert.note: Alert for Coffee (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 25 at 4:42PM CDT until March 25 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 440 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dozier, or 9 miles northwest of Opp, moving east at 35 mph. This storm produced Golf ball size hail in southern Crenshaw County Alabama. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Elba around 510 PM CDT. New Brockton around 525 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pine Level, Chestnut Grove, Richburg, Mixons Crossroads, Curtis, Carl Folsom A/p, Victoria, Danleys Crossroads, Lowry Mill and Wilkinstown. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
